Room.Name: Open Sky
Room.ShortDescription: You are southwest of Brownhaven, on the back of a dragon. 50.n0.e0.s1.w1
Room.LongDescription: The open sky is dotted with clouds, and occasionally there is fog or rain. Dragons don't normally like to fly in inclement weather, because they get lost so easily. If you fly into a cloud, there's no telling where you might wind up. The winds aloft can often carry you miles off course, if you fly that high.
